record.id: field.name="filename" and file.name="audit" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: filename
record.file.name: audit

brief.brief: This must be a valid Service Manager dbdict.

detail.detail: Service Manager validates the information in the field when adding or updating a record. If it is invalid, Service Manager issues the message: "The file name <file name> is not valid. Select one from the list."
Service Manager opens a window on the right hand side of the screen displaying a record list of valid Service Manager dbdict Names.
Select an entry in the list and press Enter. This copies the selected table name to the File Name field.
